text: "Bhashani" is an upcoming Bangladeshi historical biopic film to be directed by Syed Wahiduzzaman Diamond, based on the life of Abdul Hamid Khan Bhashani. It's shooting is expected to start in mid-2025. It will portray Bhashani from the age of 13 to death, with three different actors portraying the charecter's three different age period. ==References== Category:Bangladeshi movies
title: Bhashani (movie)
